thread.title: BRIEF-Allete Clean Energy To Sell Phase II Of Thunder Spirit Wind Farm To Montana-Dakota Utilities

title: BRIEF-Allete Clean Energy To Sell Phase II Of Thunder Spirit Wind Farm To Montana-Dakota Utilities

organizations.name: spirit wind farm to montana-dakota utilities reuters

text: March 1, 2018 / 1:32 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Allete Clean Energy To Sell Phase II Of Thunder Spirit Wind Farm To Montana-Dakota Utilities Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - Allete Inc: * PRESS RELEASE - ALLETE CLEAN ENERGY TO SELL PHASE II OF THUNDER SPIRIT WIND FARM TO MONTANA-DAKOTA UTILITIES * ALLETE CLEAN ENERGY TO SELL PHASE II OF THUNDER SPIRIT WIND FARM TO MONTANA-DAKOTA UTILITIES * ALLETE INC - ABOUT $85 MILLION SALE EXPECTED TO CLOSE WHEN ALLETE CLEAN ENERGY‘S DEVELOPMENT OF SITE, SCHEDULED TO BEGIN IN MAY 2018, IS COMPLETE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
